mapper.select: SELECT aai_seq, aai_id, aai_name, aai_role FROM admin_account_info WHERE aai_id LIKE '%${keyword}%' LIMIT 10 OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM admin_account_info WHERE aai_id LIKE '%${keyword}%'
SELECT CEIL(COUNT(*)/10) FROM admin_account_info WHERE aai_id LIKE '%${keyword}%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO admin_account_info (aai_id, aai_pwd, aai_name, aai_role) VALUES (#{aai_id}, #{aai_pwd}, #{aai_name}, #{aai_role})
mapper.update: UPDATE admin_account_info SET aai_pwd = #{aai_pwd}, aai_name = #{aai_name}, aai_role = #{aai_role} WHERE aai_seq = #{aai_seq}
mapper.select: SELECT aai_seq, aai_id, aai_name, aai_role FROM admin_account_info WHERE aai_seq = #{seq}
SELECT aai_seq, aai_id, aai_name, aai_role FROM admin_account_info WHERE aai_id = #{aai_id} and aai_pwd = #{aai_pwd}
